org.apache.flink.client.program

类 StandaloneClusterClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.client.program.ClusterClient
      • org.apache.flink.client.program.StandaloneClusterClient

  • public class StandaloneClusterClient
extends ClusterClient
    Cluster client for communication with an standalone (on-premise) cluster or an existing cluster that has been brought up independently of a specific job.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 org.apache.flink.client.program.ClusterClient

    • 方法详细资料

      • waitForClusterToBeReady

        public void waitForClusterToBeReady()
        从类复制的说明: ClusterClient
        Blocks until the client has determined that the cluster is ready for Job submission.

        This is delayed until right before job submission to report any other errors first (e.g. invalid job definitions/errors in the user jar)

        指定者:
        waitForClusterToBeReady 在类中 ClusterClient

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getNewMessages()

      • submitJob

        protected JobSubmissionResult submitJob(JobGraph jobGraph,
                                        java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
                                 throws ProgramInvocationException
        从类复制的说明: ClusterClient
        Calls the subclasses' submitJob method. It may decide to simply call one of the run methods or it may perform some custom job submission logic.
        指定者:
        submitJob 在类中 ClusterClient
        参数:
        jobGraph - The JobGraph to be submitted
        返回:
        JobSubmissionResult
        抛出:
        ProgramInvocationException
